{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Compare CROCO and HYCOM outputs\n",
    "\n",
    "This notebooks uses xoa to facilitate the comparison between CROCO and HYCOM models outputs.  \n",
    "This involves :\n",
    "* the automatic discovery of names in dataset thanks the ``xoa.cf`` module,\n",
    "* the conversion from sigma to depths coordinates thanks the ``xoa.sigma`` module,\n",
    "* the conversion from layer thickness to depths coordinates thanks to the ``xoa.grid`` module,\n",
    "* the horizontal and vertical regridding to colocate outputs thanks to the ``xoa.regrid`` module.\n",
    "\n",
    "## CROCO\n",
    "### Read"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {

       "       [3.016627, 3.083293, 3.149959, ..., 6.149947, 6.216614, 6.28328 ],\n",
       "       [3.016627, 3.083293, 3.149959, ..., 6.149947, 6.216614, 6.28328 ]],\n",
       "      dtype=float32)</pre></li><li class='xr-var-item'><div class='xr-var-name'><span class='xr-has-index'>s_rho</span></div><div class='xr-var-dims'>(s_rho)</div><div class='xr-var-dtype'>float32</div><div class='xr-var-preview xr-preview'>-0.9875 -0.9625 ... -0.0375 -0.0125</div><input id='attrs-b64494b3-5009-4a1a-b3ca-18cd8141f769' class='xr-var-attrs-in' type='checkbox' disabled><label for='attrs-b64494b3-5009-4a1a-b3ca-18cd8141f769' title='Show/Hide attributes'><svg class='icon xr-icon-file-text2'><use xlink:href='#icon-file-text2'></use></svg></label><input id='data-d7c60eee-f864-4d9b-b6d7-9a2f0143b669' class='xr-var-data-in' type='checkbox'><label for='data-d7c60eee-f864-4d9b-b6d7-9a2f0143b669' title='Show/Hide data repr'><svg class='icon xr-icon-database'><use xlink:href='#icon-database'></use></svg></label><div class='xr-var-attrs'><dl class='xr-attrs'></dl></div><pre class='xr-var-data'>array([-0.9875, -0.9625, -0.9375, -0.9125, -0.8875, -0.8625, -0.8375, -0.8125,\n",

       "        9.727178e-05, 9.727178e-05],\n",

       "       [1.002680e-04, 1.002680e-04, 1.002680e-04, ..., 1.002680e-04,\n",
       "        1.002680e-04, 1.002680e-04],\n",
       "       [1.003911e-04, 1.003911e-04, 1.003911e-04, ..., 1.003911e-04,\n",

       "       [1.005141e-04, 1.005141e-04, 1.005141e-04, ..., 1.005141e-04,\n",
       "        1.005141e-04, 1.005141e-04]], dtype=float32)</pre></li><li class='xr-var-item'><div class='xr-var-name'><span>h</span></div><div class='xr-var-dims'>(y_rho, x_rho)</div><div class='xr-var-dtype'>float32</div><div class='xr-var-preview xr-preview'>...</div><input id='attrs-bef3075f-a11e-4c64-a658-77b624ef1a50' class='xr-var-attrs-in' type='checkbox' ><label for='attrs-bef3075f-a11e-4c64-a658-77b624ef1a50' title='Show/Hide attributes'><svg class='icon xr-icon-file-text2'><use xlink:href='#icon-file-text2'></use></svg></label><input id='data-329ba504-b696-4704-8041-23f7903e6fa3' class='xr-var-data-in' type='checkbox'><label for='data-329ba504-b696-4704-8041-23f7903e6fa3' title='Show/Hide data repr'><svg class='icon xr-icon-database'><use xlink:href='#icon-database'></use></svg></label><div class='xr-var-attrs'><dl class='xr-attrs'><dt><span>long_name :</span></dt><dd>bathymetry at RHO-points</dd><dt><span>units :</span></dt><dd>meter</dd><dt><span>online_operation :</span></dt><dd>once</dd></dl></div><pre class='xr-var-data'>array([[  80.35564 ,  101.94215 ,  112.628685, ..., 2602.51    , 2620.9497  ,\n",

       "<xarray.Dataset>\n",
       "Dimensions:              (axis_nbounds: 2, s_rho: 40, s_w: 41, time_counter: 1, x_1point: 1, x_rho: 50, y_1point: 1, y_rho: 29)\n",

       "  * time_counter         (time_counter) datetime64[ns] 2014-01-02\n",
       "    time_instant         (time_counter) datetime64[ns] ...\n",

       "    Cs_r                 (s_rho, y_1point, x_1point) float32 ...\n",

    "import xarray as xr\n",
    "ds = xr.open_dataset(\"/local/home/sraynaud/Documents/Cours/Python/Data/Modeles/CROCO/croco_med.3d.nc\")\n",

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "netcdf croco_med.3d {\r\n",
      "dimensions:\r\n",
      "\ts_rho = 40 ;\r\n",
      "\ty_1point = 1 ;\r\n",
      "\tx_1point = 1 ;\r\n",
      "\ts_w = 41 ;\r\n",
      "\ttime_counter = UNLIMITED ; // (1 currently)\r\n",
      "\ty_rho = 29 ;\r\n",
      "\tx_rho = 50 ;\r\n",
      "\taxis_nbounds = 2 ;\r\n",
      "variables:\r\n",
      "\tfloat Cs_r(s_rho, y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_r:long_name = \"ocean s roms coordinate at rho point\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_r:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_r:coordinates = \"s_rho nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat Cs_w(s_w, y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_w:long_name = \"ocean s roms coordinate at w point\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_w:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tCs_w:coordinates = \"s_w nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat Salt(time_counter, s_rho, y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:long_name = \"salinity\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:units = \"PSU\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:online_operation = \"instant\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:interval_operation = \"240 s\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:interval_write = \"1 d\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:cell_methods = \"time: point (interval: 240 s)\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tSalt:coordinates = \"time_instant s_rho nav_lon_rho nav_lat_rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat Tcline(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTcline:long_name = \"S-coordinate surface/bottom layer width\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTcline:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTcline:coordinates = \"nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat Temp(time_counter, s_rho, y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:long_name = \"potential temperature\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:units = \"Celsius\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:online_operation = \"instant\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:interval_operation = \"240 s\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:interval_write = \"1 d\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:cell_methods = \"time: point (interval: 240 s)\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tTemp:coordinates = \"time_instant s_rho nav_lon_rho nav_lat_rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat Vtransform(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tVtransform:long_name = \"vertical terrain-following transformation equation\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tVtransform:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tVtransform:coordinates = \"nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat f(y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tf:long_name = \"Coriolis parameter at RHO-points\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tf:units = \"second-1\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tf:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tf:coordinates = \"nav_lon_rho nav_lat_rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat h(y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\th:long_name = \"bathymetry at RHO-points\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\th:units = \"meter\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\th:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\th:coordinates = \"nav_lon_rho nav_lat_rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat hc(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\thc:long_name = \"S-coordinate parameter, critical depth\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\thc:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\thc:coordinates = \"nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat nav_lat_1point(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_1point:standard_name = \"latitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_1point:long_name = \"Latitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_1point:units = \"degrees_north\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_1point:nav_model = \"1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat nav_lat_rho(y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_rho:standard_name = \"latitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_rho:long_name = \"Latitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_rho:units = \"degrees_north\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lat_rho:nav_model = \"rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat nav_lon_1point(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_1point:standard_name = \"longitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_1point:long_name = \"Longitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_1point:units = \"degrees_east\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_1point:nav_model = \"1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat nav_lon_rho(y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_rho:standard_name = \"longitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_rho:long_name = \"Longitude\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_rho:units = \"degrees_east\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tnav_lon_rho:nav_model = \"rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat s_rho(s_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat s_w(s_w) ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat sc_r(s_rho, y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_r:long_name = \"S-coordinate stretching curves at RHO-points\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_r:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_r:coordinates = \"s_rho nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat sc_w(s_w, y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_w:long_name = \"S-coordinate stretching curves at W-points\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_w:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tsc_w:coordinates = \"s_w nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat theta_b(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_b:long_name = \"S-coordinate bottom control parameter\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_b:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_b:coordinates = \"nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat theta_s(y_1point, x_1point) ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_s:long_name = \"S-coordinate surface control parameter\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_s:online_operation = \"once\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttheta_s:coordinates = \"nav_lon_1point nav_lat_1point\" ;\r\n",
      "\tdouble time_counter(time_counter) ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:axis = \"T\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:standard_name = \"time\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:long_name = \"Time axis\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:calendar = \"gregorian\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:units = \"seconds since 1900-01-01 00:00:00\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:time_origin = \"1900-01-01 00:00:00\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_counter:bounds = \"time_counter_bounds\" ;\r\n",
      "\tdouble time_counter_bounds(time_counter, axis_nbounds) ;\r\n",
      "\tdouble time_instant(time_counter) ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:standard_name = \"time\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:long_name = \"Time axis\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:calendar = \"gregorian\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:units = \"seconds since 1900-01-01 00:00:00\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:time_origin = \"1900-01-01 00:00:00\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\ttime_instant:bounds = \"time_instant_bounds\" ;\r\n",
      "\tdouble time_instant_bounds(time_counter, axis_nbounds) ;\r\n",
      "\tfloat w(time_counter, s_rho, y_rho, x_rho) ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:long_name = \"vertical velocity\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:units = \"meter second-1\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:online_operation = \"instant\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:interval_operation = \"240 s\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:interval_write = \"1 d\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:cell_methods = \"time: point (interval: 240 s)\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\tw:coordinates = \"time_instant s_rho nav_lon_rho nav_lat_rho\" ;\r\n",
      "\r\n",
      "// global attributes:\r\n",
      "\t\t:name = \"/scratch/home6/aserpett/MEDIONE_M0/croco_xios_2014_jan_2016_jan_1.2WD\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:description = \"Created by xios\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:title = \"Created by xios\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:Conventions = \"CF-1.5\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:production = \"An IPSL model\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:timeStamp = \"2019-Mar-07 02:43:40 GMT\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:history = \"Fri Aug 30 08:59:17 2019: ncks -O -d y_rho,688,801,4 -d x_rho,601,797,4 -d time_counter,0 -O -x -v u,v,nav_lon_u,nav_lon_v,nav_lat_u,nav_lat_v /home/shom_simurep/private/aserpett/CROCO/MEDIONE_M0/RAW/SIMU2/croco_xios_2014_jan_2016_jan_1.2WD_his.nc croco_med.3d.nc\" ;\r\n",
      "\t\t:NCO = \"4.7.1\" ;\r\n",
      "}\r\n"
     ]
    }
